alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 6:47AM EDT until April 07 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sacandaga River At Hope. * WHEN...From this morning to just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor flood stage. Water overflows onto lowlands and approaches Route 30. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:32 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 7.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:32 AM EDT Thursday was 7.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Sacandaga River Hope Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Thu 6 am: 7.0 Forecast: Thu 8 am 7.1 Thu 2 pm 7.3 Thu 8 pm 7.0 Fri 2 am 6.7 Fri 8 am 6.4 Fri 2 pm 6.1 Fri 8 pm 5.8 Sat 2 am 5.5 Sat 8 am 5.4 Sat 2 pm 5.2 Sat 8 pm 5.1 Sun 2 am 5.0 &&
